data.name: Junebug vs. Evil
data.detailed_description:
Junebug, a resourceful mountain man, has found himself under attack by the forces of evil. Equipped with a growing arsenal of weapons and supplies found around his cabin, he's ready to fight against evil, for as long as he can. The first night finds you almost unprepared and the longer you survive, the more you'll be equipped to destroy anything that lurks in the darkness.

Each Death Brings New Terror

The strange power that has cursed the land has also given you the power to come back from death, under certain circumstances. This gift comes at a cost though, as every death brings more enemies.

Fast-Paced Action

Find scrap, loot enemies, upgrade weapons, and fight until you can't. See how far you can survive!
data.about_the_game:
Junebug, a resourceful mountain man, has found himself under attack by the forces of evil. Each Death Brings New Terror

The strange power that has cursed the land has also given you the power to come back from death, under certain circumstances. This gift comes at a cost though, as every death brings more enemies.

Fast-Paced Action

data.short_description: Junebug vs. Evil is a chaotic, survival-horde game that takes inspiration from retro horror movies. Battle your way through waves of evil using anything you can find, from assault rifles to homemade firebombs. The terrors that lurk in these Appalachian woods grow stronger each night, but so do you!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 755M or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
